start.incoming_comms_text: Find a way to destroy Iron Sun before it obliterates Terra Noua! Also, defend us at the HQ.

set_ship_text.name: Iron Sun
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Invulnerable to known attacks. Charged up in |IronSunFireInMinutes| minutes.

warning_popup_message.message: Iron Sun fired and obliterated Terra Noua; mission lost

set_ship_text.name: Armory
set_ship_text.desc: Produces tactical ordnance: torpedoes, pshocks and EMPs.

set_ship_text.name: Torpedo
set_ship_text.desc: Adds 10 torpedos to station inventory in exchange for Parts.

set_ship_text.name: PShock
set_ship_text.desc: Adds 5 pshocks to station inventory in exchange for Minerals.

set_ship_text.name: EMP
set_ship_text.desc: Adds 2 EMPs to station inventory in exchange for Gas.
